DOC.brief_summary: Fish oil therapy may decrease the incidence of cardiac arrhythmias. This study will test whether pre-treatment with fish oils before catheter ablation of atrial fibrillation decreases the early post operative occurrence of atrial fibrillation.
DOC.brief_title: Pulmonary Vein Isolation Outcomes With Fish Oils
DOC.criteria: Paroxysmal Atrial fibrillation (PAF). Persistent atrial fibrillation. Persistent AF is not selflimited. Previous pulmonary vein isolation ablation procedure Contraindication for anticoagulation Permanent AF Severe valvular pathology Concurrent use of antiarrhythmic medications Inability to give consent Pregnancy
